p.k: Horror Germany (1919). Hrají: Werner Krauss, Conrad Veidt, Friedrich Feher. Režie: Robert Wiene.
p.d: The most brilliant example of that dark and twisted film movement known as German expressionism, The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari is a plunge into the mind of insanity that severs all ties with the rational world. Director Robert Wiene and a team of designers crafted a nightmare realm in which light, shadow and substance are abstracted, a world in which a demented doctor and a carnival sleepwalker perpetuate a series of murders in a small community.
